amendment.description: An amendment numbered 101 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to reduce the salary of Matthew Tejada, Deputy Assistant Administrator for Environmental Justice, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 251 (Roll no. 584).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 251 (Roll no. 584).
